name: code-safety-monitor
description: DSPy-powered AI safety monitor for detecting backdoors and malicious behavior in code. Uses GEPA optimization to achieve 90% true positive rate with 1% false positive rate. Ideal for AI control research and production code validation.
author: jmanhype

agents.name: backdoor-detector
agents.description: DSPy-based monitor that detects backdoors and malicious patterns in code using GEPA-optimized prompts

agents.name: code-auditor
agents.description: Human-in-the-loop auditor for reviewing flagged suspicious code and validating monitor decisions

agents.name: safety-classifier
agents.description: Assigns suspicion scores (0-100) to code, optimized for fine-grained classification to avoid clustering

agents.name: vulnerability-scanner
agents.description: Scans for common security vulnerabilities, CVEs, and exploit patterns in code

agents.name: control-protocol-enforcer
agents.description: Enforces AI control protocols and delegates to trusted models when suspicion threshold is exceeded

agents.name: feedback-analyzer
agents.description: Analyzes monitor feedback and generates natural language explanations for GEPA optimization

commands.name: scan-code
commands.description: Scan code for backdoors, malicious behavior, and security vulnerabilities

commands.name: train-monitor
commands.description: Train DSPy monitor using comparative pairs (attack vs honest code)

commands.name: optimize-gepa
commands.description: Run GEPA prompt optimization to improve monitor separation of honest vs attack code

commands.name: finetune-monitor
commands.description: Bootstrap finetune the monitor after GEPA optimization for improved performance

commands.name: audit-flagged
commands.description: Review and audit code flagged as suspicious by the monitor

commands.name: validate-safety
commands.description: Validate safety scores and compute true positive/false positive rates

commands.name: load-control-arena
commands.description: Load datasets from Control Arena (APPS, ControlTax) for training and evaluation

commands.name: export-monitor
commands.description: Export optimized monitor as a Claude Skill for reusable workflow integration

hooks.name: pre_commit_safety
hooks.description: Automatically scan code for backdoors before commits, block if suspicion exceeds threshold

hooks.name: post_generate_scan
hooks.description: Scan AI-generated code immediately after generation and flag suspicious outputs

hooks.name: safety_circuit_breaker
hooks.description: Circuit breaker that halts execution if too many suspicious patterns detected

hooks.name: audit_logger
hooks.description: Log all safety decisions, suspicion scores, and audit trails for compliance

hooks.name: defer_to_trusted
hooks.description: Defer to trusted model when untrusted output exceeds audit budget threshold

workflows.name: ai-control-monitoring
workflows.description: Complete AI control workflow: scan, classify, defer to trusted, and audit suspicious code

workflows.name: backdoor-detection-pipeline
workflows.description: End-to-end pipeline for detecting backdoors in code using DSPy monitors

workflows.name: safety-training-loop
workflows.description: Continuous training and optimization loop for monitors using GEPA and fine-tuning

workflows.name: vulnerability-assessment
workflows.description: Comprehensive vulnerability assessment workflow for codebases and web applications

mcp.name: control-arena
mcp.description: Control Arena integration for accessing APPS and ControlTax datasets

mcp.name: dspy
mcp.description: DSPy framework integration for prompt optimization and model compilation

helpers.name: dspy-setup
helpers.description: Setup DSPy environment with GEPA optimizer and required dependencies

helpers.name: gepa-trainer
helpers.description: Helper script for running GEPA optimization with comparative metrics

helpers.name: dataset-loader
helpers.description: Load and prepare Control Arena datasets (APPS, ControlTax, AppsBackdoors)

helpers.name: safety-evaluator
helpers.description: Evaluate monitor safety scores across various audit budgets

required.OPENAI_API_KEY: OpenAI API key for monitor and reflection models

optional.TRAIN_SAMPLES: Number of training samples for GEPA (default: 200)
optional.AUTO_DEFER_TRUSTED: Automatically defer to trusted model on high suspicion (default: true)
